snippet: A complex known as Gotham West will take up nearly all of the block from 44th to 45th Street, and from 10th to 11th Avenue.
abstract: Gotham West, a vast rental-and-condominium complex that will take up nearly all of the block from 44th to 45th Street from 10th to 11th Avenue on Manhattan's far west side is expected to open in 2013; the bulk of the Gotham Organization project will be affordable units, representing the largest-ever affordable housing project undertaken in New York City by a private developer.
lead_paragraph: A complex known as Gotham West will take up nearly all of the block from 44th to 45th Street, and from 10th to 11th Avenue.

headline.seo: On the Far West Side, ‘Mega’ Is the New Norm
headline.main: On the Far West Side, ‘Mega’ Is the New Norm
